verbose_text: Treatment with 12.5 muM RSV significantly increased the expression of autophagy marker proteins such as Atg5, Atg7 and LC3-II / LC3-I, which was accompanied by the activation of Sirt1 (all P < 0.05 vs. control group).
evidence: expression of autophagy marker proteins such as Atg5, Atg7 and LC3-II/LC3-I
